name: Greg Cox
description:
I am very simple, down to earth and respectful. I am a man of the country at heart. Be quiet, yet I love the people, being open to new things in the love life to treat people the way I wanted to be treated, love shopping, camping, country, beach, traveling and animals meet.
I need respectful,hard working and caring. I need someone I can trust with all my heart. I am looking for a woman who is ready to love and give all of her in a relationship. I need true love, real love …pure snow white kind of love because I have same and and more to give her.
